duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer all aspects of Government Program funding and invoicing processes.
Communicate with government program applicants and government entities on inquiries in a timely and professional manner.
Assist in the preparation of monthly, quarterly and ad-hoc reporting to support Comcast regulatory affairs, government affairs, and compliance requests.
Prepare financial reports analyzing data for management review.
Interpret accounting data, analyze reports and recommend action to be taken.
Ensure the balance sheet accounts are accurately stated based on compiled reconciliation procedures and agreement with source documents.
Maintain government program receivables ledger and prepare variance explanations.
Enter monthly journal entries to properly record accounting transactions, ensuring that journal entries have proper backup to substantiate the entry.
Research ways of streamlining and standardizing processes.
Prepare financial reports analyzing data for management review.
Calculate payments to regulatory authorities based on a review of contracts and regulations.
Review financial statements for operating trends and results.
Consistent exercise of independent judgment and discretion in matters of significance.
Regular, consistent and punctual attendance. Must be able to work nights and weekends, variable schedule(s) and overtime as necessary.
Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
